Title: Introducing Microsoft Foundry Tools | BRK192
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
AI agents need tools to take actions and complete their workflow; tools that can parse documents, transcribe call recordings, do custom translation--all with LLMs wrapped within them. In this session, we are introducing a new suite of production-ready tools in Microsoft Foundry, designed to seamlessly plug into your agentic AI apps, either using APIs or as MCP servers.

Chapters: 0:00 - Introduction and Session Kickoff by Vinod 00:01:28 - Focus on Foundry Tools and AI Agent Capabilities 00:09:06 - Live Demo Scenario: AI Agent for Insurance Claim Processing 00:11:24 - Agent retrieves historical data from Azure Database to answer claim approval time 00:13:59 - Introduction to Content Understanding for document-based workflows 00:21:00 - Introduction of bring-your-own-model capability allowing users to select model versions such as GPT-4.0 or 4.1 00:25:01 - Agent analysis results showing extracted data and confidence indicators 00:26:06 - Claim confirmation and database integration with Cosmos DB 00:34:42 - Addressing Data Privacy: Redacting Sensitive Information in Translated Documents
